response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and the time invested in its development, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to own this exceptional product at an exclusive price of $18,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also allowing us to fairly compensate for the effort and resources invested. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 18000}
